Title: Lies of the Heart: The Story of Laurie Kellogg
Actors: Gregory Harrison, Jennie Garth, Steven Keats
Plot: Fact-based made-for-TV movie about Laurie Kellogg, who was accused of murdering her husband Bruce in May 1992; told in flashbacks while she's waiting for her judgment. When she was 16, Laurie met Bruce Kellogg, a charming guy 15 y...
